subject: Web3
title: Stablecoins and Traditional Finance
description: A 60-second lesson on Stablecoins and Traditional Finance.

hook.text: Banks, payment companies, and asset managers are all building stablecoin products. Traditional finance is embracing them.

buildup.text: JPMorgan created JPM Coin for institutional settlements. Visa settles transactions in USDC. BlackRock launched a tokenized fund.

discovery.text: The merger is accelerating. Stablecoins get banking infrastructure. Banks get blockchain efficiency. Both sides benefit.

twist.text: As banks adopt stablecoins, the original crypto vision of replacing banks fades. Banks are absorbing the technology instead.

climax.text: Stablecoins won't replace banks. They'll rewire how banks move money behind the scenes. Revolution through integration.

punchline.text: Crypto wanted to replace banks. Banks are adopting the technology instead.

quiz.question: How is traditional finance adopting stablecoins?
options: JPMorgan, Visa, and BlackRock are using them for settlements and products
